name: restreamer
description: Restreamer is a self-hosted video streaming server that allows live streaming from RTMP, SRT, or WebRTC sources. It offers transcoding, recording, and multi-platform streaming via a clean web UI.

features.title: Multi
features.description: Accept streams from RTMP, SRT, WebRTC, and HTTP sources

features.title: Live Transcoding
features.description: Convert video formats and resolutions in real-time for different platforms

features.title: Multi
features.description: Broadcast simultaneously to YouTube, Twitch, Facebook, and custom RTMP servers

features.title: Recording
features.description: Save live streams to disk for later playback or archival

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Configure and monitor streams through an intuitive browser-based interface

features.title: Overlay Support
features.description: Add logos, text, or images to streams before broadcasting

features.title: Audio Mixing
features.description: Combine multiple audio sources or add background music to streams

features.title: Adaptive Bitrate
features.description: Generate multiple quality levels for viewers with different bandwidth
